messages.title: Vote Matt Turmaine Watford's next MP
messages.content: There's not long to go now before postal votes begin to land. We have the opportunity to remove this government, a government that has failed Watford. It's time for a change, out-of-touch with reality and tired of David Cameron.

messages.title: Matt Turmaine - winning choice for Watford
messages.content: Only Labour can beat Tories here. Matt Turmaine will bring a fresh start... Labour - a better future

keyPolicies.policyDescription: I will protect the NHS and modernising Watford hospital is my top priority.
I promise Labour will cap energy bills until 2017.
I'll support Watford’s young people into housing - Labour pledges to build 200,000 new homes a year by 2020.
I'll vote to bring in proper border checks to control immigration in Britain.
I back Labour's compulsory jobs guarantee offer to get people into work - Labour will stop benefits for those who refuse.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only Labour can beat Tories here in Watford.

issues.economy: Labour understands we will manage the economy better and pay off the debt.
issues.health: Protecting the NHS and modernising Watford hospital is a top priority.
issues.immigration: Vote to bring in proper border checks to control immigration in Britain.
issues.socialWelfare: Compulsory jobs guarantee offer to get people into work; stopping benefits for those who refuse.

housing.content: Supporting young people into housing; pledge to build 200,000 new homes a year by 2020.

leaflet.personalStatement: It's time for a fresh start with a local MP who will put Watford first. Like many of you, I've been let down by Nick Clegg's Liberal Democrats too.

contactInformation.address: Matt Turmaine To Win, FREPOST RSGS-XLAC-JBZJ, 27 Station Road, Watford, WD17 1AP

images.caption: Photo of Matt Turmaine with constituents.
